verbs.description: redskins s [V: troy] [ARG2: apke] heading to injured reserve the washington redskins have been dealing with various injuries all season leading to frequent absences on both offense and defense unfortunately for head coach jay gruden troy apke arizona karl joseph injured reserve football washington jeremy reaves washington redskins jay gruden redskins the redskins
